item.title: Venus and crescent Moon stun stargazers
item.description: The planet appeared shining brightly above a crescent Moon on Friday.

item.title: Biden blocks Japan's Nippon Steel from buying US Steel
item.description: Biden decided to scrap the deal despite concerns that it could damage Washington's relations with Tokyo.

item.title: Trump to be sentenced over hush money case but judge signals no jail time
item.description: The US president-elect dismisses the case as "nothing but a rigged charade".

item.title: Briton among dead in New Orleans vehicle attack
item.description: The family of London man Edward Pettifer mourn a "wonderful son, brother, grandson, nephew and friend".

item.title: Bringing a tyrannical Ethiopian queen and her twins to life
item.description: A compelling new audio drama shines a spotlight on Ethiopia's ancient Aksumite Empire.
